tr.td: 10 mg / mL fibrinogen in 0.9% (wt/v) NaCl solution in water
Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM), 10% fetal bovine serum, 1% penicillin-streptomycin
Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM), 2% horse serum, 10 μg / mL insulin, 1% penicillin-streptomycin
Ham’s F-10 nutrient mix, 20% fetal bovine serum, 5 ng / mL basic fibroblast growth factor, 1% penicillin-streptomycin
Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM), 4 mg / mL bovine fibrinogen, Geltrex (20% v / v), thrombin (0.2 unit/mg fibrinogen)
15.5 mM NH4Cl, 1 mM KHCO3, 10 μM EDTA
